name: albums_by_artist
description: Returns all albums by a given artist.

name: albums_by_genres
description: Returns all albums that contain any of the genres specified in the provided genres list.

genres.description: A list of genre strings to filter albums by.

name: top_streamed_songs
description: Returns the n most streamed songs.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

name: songs_by_release_date
description: Retrieves all songs released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

name: songs_by_longest_duration
description: Returns the top 'n' songs sorted by their duration, from longest to shortest.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

name: songs_by_danceability
description: Returns the top 10 songs sorted by streams that have a danceability rating above a specified threshold percentage.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (in percentage) to filter songs by.

name: songs_by_explicitness
description: Retrieves the top 10 songs filtered by their explicit content, sorted by a metric such as streams or popularity.

explicit.description: True for explicit content, False otherwise. Defaults to True.

name: filter_albums_by_date_range
description: Filters and retrieves albums released within a specified date range. The range is inclusive of the start and end dates.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: albums_by_genres2
description: Retrieves albums that match specified inclusion and exclusion genre criteria.

genres_in.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

genres_out.description: A list of genre strings the albums must not contain.

name: albums_by_date_and_genres
description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year that match any of the specified genres.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: A list of genre strings to filter albums by.

name: high_rated_albums
description: Retrieves albums with an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums. Defaults to 4.0 if not specified.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

name: top_streamed_songs_by_genre
description: Retrieves the top streamed songs within a specific genre, sorted by number of streams.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness
description: Retrieves songs that meet a specified danceability threshold and explicitness criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

name: albums_by_year_genres_and_descriptors
description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, month, or year, that fit within specified genres and match given descriptors.

release_date.description: Release date to filter albums by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: List of genres to filter albums by.

descriptors.description: List of descriptors to match albums with.

name: high_rated_reviewed_albums
description: Retrieves albums that meet specific criteria of high average ratings, a minimum number of ratings, and a minimum number of reviews.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness_speechiness
description: Retrieves songs based on specified thresholds for danceability, speechiness, and explicit content criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

speechiness_threshold.description: The minimum speechiness rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date
description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by a specific artist, released on a given date, month, or year.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

release_date.description: The release date of the songs to filter by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

name: unique_albums
description: Finds albums that are distinctive in terms of genre diversity and artist collaboration but have lower average ratings.

genres_threshold.description: The minimum number of genres an album must cover.

artist_count_threshold.description: The minimum number of artists required to be involved in an album.

max_rating_threshold.description: The maximum average rating that an album can have.
